reviewText: Sex, Secrets & Lies 2 follows in the treatment given the first film in this series by censoring the sex out of the sex scenes so they last about a minute...and the minute of action that you DO see consists of one or two shots in slow-motion mostly above the waist so you don't really see anything anyway.  I don't think these films were what's considered hardcore porn to begin with, so I don't know who the knucklehead was who thought it would be a good idea to release these as "cleaned-up" versions. What--they actually thought customers were gonna buy these just for the plots and the great acting?
